channel.title: Errors! help please!

item.title: Errors! help please!
item.dc:creator: @newservermaker newservermaker
item.description:
@newservermaker wrote:

ok i want to make my black demon drop a scythe but i get these errors:

NPCHandler.java:25: illegal start of type if(npcs(84).npcType == 84) ^ NPCHandler.java:25: invalid method declaration; return type required if(npcs(84).npcType == 84) ^ NPCHandler.java:25: illegal start of type if(npcs(84).npcType == 84) ^ 3 errors Press any key to continue . . .

heres what i have

[code]if(npcs(84).npcType == 84)
{
ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomscythe(), npcs[84].absX, npcs[84].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(84),

false);
}[/code]

Read full topic
